name: Defend Your Base
description:
Defend your Base! Play this thrilling arcade shooter to survive as long as possible while always racing to red squares as fast as possible to heal them before they turn black and are lost forever.
Play this game if you enjoy limited play-time before you eventually lose. It is impossible to survive forever but with skill and persistence, you can greatly extend your survival time.
Play this game if you enjoy a simplistic action game that runs on every device and that looks retro.
You may enjoy that this game offers no distractions and no phony content, it is all about it's core action.

Gameplay: You navigate your "soldier" square around the board using the ARROW-Keys and get to red "infected" squares as fast as possible. If red squares turn black, they are lost forever. You lose the game once all squares are black.
